mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, replytext, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set replytext = #{replytext}, replyer = #{replyer}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
